About Me

As a Front-End Developer my aim is to leverage the potentials of a full time development role with mentorship while having room to grow. Really love the creativity and visual aspects of Front-End and would like the opportunity to prove myself by delivering outstanding projects.

Favourite things are running, cuddling my dogs 🐶 and playing board games with friends.

My Projects

Preview

Hotel Still Life

  • Github
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Sass
  • JavaScript
  • Responsive

Hotel Still Life is a fancy hotel based in Switzerland where you may escape for a while from day-to-day life.

A multi-page project built with HTML, vanilla JavaScript and CSS that is structured with Sass. Works well on all different sized screens. This is a work in progress and I have plans for more functionality over time.

Preview

Tech Ladies

  • Github
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • jQuery
  • Responsive

Tech Ladies is a non-profit organization dedicated to empowering and training especially those who come from underrepresented groups.

A responsive single page project using Flexbox for layout and jQuery for smooth navigation scroll. The map is implemented with Maps JavaScript API.

Preview

Smoothery

  • Github
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Responsive

Smoothery offers a healthy range of delicious, organic smoothies and juices for kick-starting your day.

A multi-page website using floats for the layout and designed with desktop-first approach to look well at all screen sizes.

For more of my projects please check out my Github
